package.name: e2fsprogs
package.patch: # First, fix a script that adjusts testing output: sed -i -e 's:\[\.-\]::' tests/filter.sed
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/build jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ../configure --prefix=/usr \ --with-root-prefix="" \ --enable-elf-shlibs \ --disable-libblkid \ --disable-libuuid \ --disable-uuidd \ --disable-fsck make -j $jobcount
